archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0152
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to configure the notifications channel for customers based on their current situation, so that customers can be notified in their channel of choice

properties.value: "Current situation" to be cleared. Some examples needed. For example: if they don't have an app, we should not show them that option.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
